title: crypto/md5 Sum functions returns the data arg too.
body:
by **enricl**: 
md5.Sum(data []byte) [Size]byte,  does return the data arg too.

What does 'go version' print?
  go version go1.2 linux/amd64

What steps reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
  http://play.golang.org/p/qYYNUtbwoJ

What happened?
  returned "54686520666f672069732067657474696e6720746869636b657221bd009e4d93affc7c69101d2e0ec4bfde"

What should have happened instead?
  should have returned "bd009e4d93affc7c69101d2e0ec4bfde"
